Gauss Shield.name: Gauss Shield
Gauss Shield.descr: You may upgrade Gauss Shield Ship parts. Opponents are -1 to hit your equipped Ships.

Improved Hull.name: Improved Hull
Improved Hull.descr: You may upgrade Improved Hull Ship parts. Two hull per slot.

Fusion Source.name: Fusion Source
Fusion Source.descr: You may upgrade Fusion Source Ship parts

Positron Computer.name: Positron Computer
Positron Computer.descr: You may upgrade Positron Computer Ship parts. Your equipped Ships are +2 to hit

Advanced Economy.name: Advanced Economy
Advanced Economy.descr: You may place Population Cubes in the advanced Money squares with your colony ships

Tachyon Drive.name: Tachyon Drive
Tachyon Drive.descr: You may upgrade Tachyon Drive Ship parts. Equipped Ships can move 3 hexes per move action.

Antimatter Cannon.name: Antimatter Cannon
Antimatter Cannon.descr: You may upgrade Antimatter Cannon Ship parts. Red die cannon.

Quantum Grid.name: Quantum Grid
Quantum Grid.descr: You receive two additional influence Discs, placed immediately on your influence track
